message: It’s time to go beyond awareness raising and education, and work on the long-term solutions that will put sex trafficking and sexual exploitation out of business for good.

data.description: Sex trafficking is happening at staggering rates in the U.S., typically to vulnerable woman and girls (but boys, too) and usually through a false pretense of love the exploiter promises his victim.
data.title: These are ways we can end sexual exploitation, trafficking for good
